field.name: summary
field.value: NamingPartsSubSystem broken when RegisterHandlerForwarding is used

field.name: description
field.value: NamingPartsSubSystem uses ':' to detect properties in component's name (ComponentName.Setup). DefaultKernel.RegisterHandlerForwarding uses 'forwardedType.FullName + ": Forward to: " + name' as the new handler name, and thus causing ComponentName.Setup to try parsing the name, which obviously fails. Is this formatting something important or just dropping the ':' from the new handler name would be acceptible?
